AT.name: Chain Blaster
AT.description: nintendolife.com: „Good - 7/10“ „Blastin’ makes me feel good” „Fans of shoot ‘em ups, especially of the bullet hell variety, should definitely give this one a shot.” Set in the future, a deadly virus infiltrates the world's super computer and puts on standby the world's nuclear weapons ready for launch. With the world on the brink of destruction, take control of an anti-virus ship and go head to head with the virus, taking on wave after wave of enemy ships in a fierce battle to save the world. Use special shots known as Chain Blasts to counter the virus ships as they swarm together in attack formations. Trigger a Chain Blast at just the right point to set in motion a combo explosion that will take out the entire chain of enemies. The more enemies you take out in one blast the higher your score. Upload your Top Score online and see how you stack up against players from around the world.

AU.name: Chain Blaster
AU.description: nintendolife.com: „Good - 7/10“ „Blastin’ makes me feel good” „Fans of shoot ‘em ups, especially of the bullet hell variety, should definitely give this one a shot.” Set in the future, a deadly virus infiltrates the world's super computer and puts on standby the world's nuclear weapons ready for launch. With the world on the brink of destruction, take control of an anti-virus ship and go head to head with the virus, taking on wave after wave of enemy ships in a fierce battle to save the world. Upload your Top Score online and see how you stack up against players from around the world.

BE.name: Chain Blaster
BE.description: nintendolife.com: „Good - 7/10“ „Blastin’ makes me feel good” „Fans of shoot ‘em ups, especially of the bullet hell variety, should definitely give this one a shot.” Dans un avenir proche, un virus mortel a contaminé le super ordinateur mondial et a activé les armes nucléaires du monde entier. Le monde est au bord de la destruction. Pilotez un vaisseau antiviral et repoussez les vagues de vaisseaux ennemis dans un combat féroce pour sauver la planète. Utilisez des tirs spéciaux, ou « Explosions en chaîne », pour contrer les vaisseaux viraux lorsqu’ils sont en formation d’attaque. Lancez une explosion en chaîne au bon moment pour déclencher une série d’explosions qui anéantira la flotte ennemie. Plus vous éliminez d’ennemis en un tir, plus votre score augmente. Téléchargez votre meilleur score en ligne et mesurez-vous aux joueurs du monde entier.
